name: Planetoid (itch) (Ben James)
description:
Planetoid is a side-scrolling shooter based on the classic arcade game Defender.

  • Zoom left and right destroying all enemies in your path
  • Rescue the humanoids from being abducted by Landers
  • Catch falling humanoids and return them to the surface
  • Use the hyperspace button to escape tricky situations
  • Deploy smart bombs to destroy all on-screen enemies

If you enjoy the web game please consider purchasing the Windows version for a small fee - it really helps me, but mostly importantly, have fun!
